no.ntnu.idi.freerider.backend
Interface SocialNetwork

All Known Implementing Classes:
FacebookFilter
public interface SocialNetwork

An interface wrapping social network connections and requests, to minimize coupling.

Method Summary
 void filterSearch(java.util.List<Journey> journeys, java.lang.String searcherID, java.lang.String accessToken)
          Takes the given List of Journeys and removes any which are not visible to the user identified by searcher, according to their particular visibility.
 

Method Detail

filterSearch

void filterSearch(java.util.List<Journey> journeys,
                  java.lang.String searcherID,
                  java.lang.String accessToken)
Takes the given List of Journeys and removes any which are not visible to the user identified by searcher, according to their particular visibility.

Parameters:
journeys - The List to filter.
searcher - The user asking for the List.
accessToken - Access token for access to the searcher's friendship relations.
